name: SpaceRocks (ExStefen)
description:
A Gameboy Advanced Game. SpaceRocks brings forth the arcade experience of Side scrolling Shooter games similar to Gradius and R-Type.

SpaceRocks is programmed in C using devkitPro and libtonc Library.

This Demo was a highly marked project for the first year of my Games programming degree in Game Hardware Architecture.

Programmers:

NamesRoles in developmentExStefenLead Programmer/Gameplay Design/DirectorIsaac
Game mechanics/LogicCsabaUI/Textures/Game Design Key bindings on GBA:
  • A: Confirm/Shoot
  • D-Pad: Movement

There are a few bugs but fully invisible enemy ships is a feature.

Known bugs are:

  1. Unlimited Upgrades
  2. Random health bar not proportionate with Life points
  3. The usual Diagonal Movement Boost caused by not Normalising direction
  4. Not able to replay after high score

For any feedback and suggestions you're free to visit the GitHub Repository for this project:

https://github.com/ExStefenGR/SpaceRocks

For the above there might be a fix if people actually play the game and/or request it.
